EVkGh9Lf.name: Sprout me
EVkGh9Lf.description: Sprouting jar designed for sprouting Indian beans: particularly moong beans, Mot ( matki) beans, Whole black gram ( Kala chana), whole red lentils (Kala masoor ), ⁠Field beans (vaal), ⁠Kidney beans (rajma). The sprout jar lid holes are also designed for sprouting smaller seeds such as Methi, Alfalfa, Broccoli seeds, Radish, Mixed seeds, millets, and micro greens. Designed for sprouting in the Indian climate where germination requires optimum drainage and ventilation for crunchy sprouts. Simple to use: Soak beans in the sprouting jar overnight, drain, and put the jar in the slanting position. Rinse and drain 1-2 times per day and within 2-4 days you have delicious crunchy hygienic sprouts! How it works: Ventilation and draining are key to successful sprouting. A specially designed lid with 132 small holes provides optimum ventilation, and the lid stand puts the jar at the exact perfect angle for drainage. The sprouting jar helps in faster and more hygienic germination when you sprout beans or seeds. Easy to clean: The jar and lid are easy to clean! we recommend you use two separate sprout-meTM jars for sprouting a variety of beans and sprouts. A perfect gift! The unique design makes a statement in every home! And sprout-meTM comes in a fitted box gift packing.
